item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 8, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. An open discussion forum for ArXiv papers (193 points | 61 comments)
2. PC Floppy Copy Protection: Softguard Superlok (32 points | 10 comments)
3. Concrete clickbait: next time you share a spomenik photo, think abt what it mean (2016) (36 points | 17 comments)
4. Rethinking Addiction as a Chronic Brain Disease (32 points | 24 comments)
5. Asking the Wrong Questions (2017) (140 points | 73 comments)
6. WebP: The WebPage Compression Format (440 points | 156 comments)
7. Baiting the bot (81 points | 38 comments)
8. How a 16th Century Explorer's Sailing Ship Works (40 points | 3 comments)
9. Cracking an old ZIP file to help open source the ANC's "Vula" secret crypto code (236 points | 24 comments)
10. Cruise ships chopped in half are a license to print money (149 points | 92 comments)
11. Keyhole – Forge own Windows Store licenses (565 points | 256 comments)
12. CitizenDJ – Make music using free audio and video from the Library of Congress (167 points | 10 comments)
13. LuaJIT PR: Add Support for RISC-V 64 (40 points | 7 comments)
14. Dogs can remember names of toys years after not seeing them, study shows (260 points | 143 comments)
15. A new rare high-rank elliptic curve, and an orchard of Diophantine equations (183 points | 11 comments)
16. Microui+fenster=Small GUI (123 points | 16 comments)
17. A day in the life of the fastest supercomputer (5 points | 3 comments)
18. Battlestar Galactica: Technical Manual (2005) (47 points | 26 comments)
19. The worsening Raspberry Pi RP2350 E9 erratum situation (61 points | 7 comments)
20. Appalachian Trail Hiker Photo Archive (118 points | 22 comments)
21. The "email is authentication" pattern (227 points | 319 comments)
22. Early science and stone engineering in Menga, a Neolithic dolmen (19 points | discuss)
23. Beyond Ctrl-C: The dark corners of Unix signal handling (113 points | 39 comments)
24. The little-known life of the scarfing tool (2003) (11 points | 1 comment)
25. Groups underpin modern math (88 points | 33 comments)
26. Things to know about the Great Wave (246 points | 80 comments)
27. GPT-fabricated scientific papers on Google Scholar (167 points | 88 comments)
28. Gnome Files: A detailed UI examination (249 points | 167 comments)
29. Hallelujah, Leonard Cohen, and a Pulitzer Prize-winning writer's suicide (141 points | 83 comments)
30. How to wrap a C compiler and preprocessor, really (58 points | 2 comments)
